controller

Class RunningGameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.app.state.BaseAppState
      • controller.RunningGameState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme3.app.state.AppState, de.lessvoid.nifty.screen.ScreenController

    public class RunningGameState
extends com.jme3.app.state.BaseAppState
implements de.lessvoid.nifty.screen.ScreenController
    This is Run State Class that appear when the game is running. This class handle the state transition when pausing, restarting, or ending the game.
    Since:
    Monday, 06 November 2017
